text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
August 11, 1960
Dr. Harry Skornia
President
N.A.E.B.
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
The attached blank is checked and submitted for your compilation. I am
most appreciative to all those who have had any part in working out such
a fine solution. It just shows what can be done when good brains get
together.
With kindest regards, I am
Raymond D. Hurlbert
Director, Region 11
RDH/ml
enc.
